pkgmetadata.longdescription: Subsample Temporal Data to Synchronal Events and Compute the MCI // The function 'syncSubsample' subsamples temporal data of different entities so that the result only contains synchronal events. The function 'mci' calculates the Movement Coordination Index (MCI, see reference on help page for function 'mci') of a data set created with the function 'syncSubsample'.
